mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member(mbAuth, mbEmail, mbPwd, mbPwdSalt, mbName, mbphone, mbAddr) VALUES(#{mbAuth}, #{mbEmail}, #{mbPwd}, #{mbPwdSalt}, #{subject}, #{contents}, #{writer}, #{filename2}, #{pwd})
select COUNT(*) from centerinfo c join (select * from member where mbDelYN='N') m on c.mbNo=m.mbNo where c.ctDelYN = 'R' OR c.ctDelYN = 'Y' order by c.ctNo DESC
select * from centerinfo c join (select * from member where mbDelYN='N') m on c.mbNo=m.mbNo where c.ctDelYN = 'R' OR c.ctDelYN = 'Y' order by c.ctNo DESC limit #{currentPage},#{displayPageNum}
